item.title: Faker
item.description: Faker will generate you a fake data based on your Struct.

item.title: Saint
item.description:
Source code: github

Download

go get -u github.com/bxcodec/saint

Example

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"github.com/bxcodec/saint"
)

func main() {


 arr:=[] int {2,1,3,5,6}
 var x int

 x= saint.Max(arr...)
 fmt.Println(x) // 6

 x= saint.Max(4,3,1,5,7)
 fmt.Println(x) // 7

 x= saint.Min(arr...)
 fmt.Println(x) // 1

 x= saint.Min(4,3,5,5,7)
 fmt.Println(x) // 3

 x= saint.Sum(arr...)
 fmt.Println(x) // 17

 x = saint.Sum(4,5)
 fmt.Println(x) // 9
}
